ygData.subject: AC vs Stat enhancing armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail all, This question most likely has been asked already and I apologize if I m repeating but I am new to the list and rather new to casting class in
ygData.messageBody:
Hail all,

This question most likely has been asked already and I apologize if I'm
repeating but I am new to the list and rather new to casting class in
general.

My question is, which is better, pure AC or stat enchancing armor? I was
thinking of covering myself fully in bronze plate but there are things like
BS tunic, barb arms, silver plated bracers that I will be putting aside. I
am playing mostly a casting cleric...and I figured AC would save my life
more then any stat enhancing armor. Any thoughts?

-Imogen
